name: dim_slack_users
description:
One record per user that has, or has ever had, the ability to post a message in dbt Slack. This includes admin users, bots, and deactivated users, and _excludes_ users that have been invited, but have not yet accepted their invite.
Note: the # of users in "announcements" includes invited users, so calculating `count(*)` on this model will result in a lower number than the number reported in Slack.

measures.name: community_slack_members_new
measures.expr: CASE WHEN user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
